title: Phrack World News Announcement
historical_context: This article marks a significant moment in the Phrack zine's timeline, indicating a hiatus and the anticipation of future content.
target_audience: Hackers, Phrackers, and fans of hacker culture
short_summary: The Phrack Staff announces the upcoming release of Phrack World News, highlighting the time elapsed since the last issue and expressing excitement for future updates.
summary:
In this brief announcement, the Phrack Staff reflects on the considerable gap since the last Phrack release, emphasizing the changes and developments that have occurred in the hacker community during that time. The staff expresses their enthusiasm for the forthcoming Phrack World News, which promises to deliver fresh insights and updates relevant to the hacking scene. This announcement serves as a reminder of the zine's enduring legacy and its role in documenting the evolution of hacker culture.

The anticipation surrounding the release of Phrack World News underscores the zine's importance as a platform for sharing knowledge and fostering community among hackers and phreakers. As the staff prepares to unveil new content, readers are encouraged to stay tuned for updates, signaling a revitalization of the Phrack series and its commitment to keeping the hacker community informed and engaged.
